column3: The items in your bag have temporarily transformed into worthless stone.
You find yourself short of breath, unable to sprint.
Your body is fatigued and wounds refuse to heal on their own.
An ancient enchantment is rendering all magicite useless.
This <Switch(PlayerParameter(109))><Case(1)>floor</Case><Case(2)>floor</Case><Case(3)>floor</Case><Case(4)>area</Case></Switch>'s powerful wards are preventing the use of the demiclone generator...
An ancient enchantment has cooled your censer and sealed it shut.
